captions.text: Winning Red Bull BC One is a dream that has finally come true for me.It is too compelling to be described with words.
I will go to the finals in the Netherlands and I will do my best to represent Italy, I promise it to everybody.

title: Red Bull BC One Cypher - 2012 Italy

think that "CCCP the BEST). Think next time.
